mapper.insert: insert into gallery( num, userId, title, content )values( nextval('gNum_seq'), #{userId}, #{title}, #{content} )

insert into board_attach ( board_type, board_id, file_num, file_name, saved_file_name, file_size )values ( 'Gallery', #{board_id}, nextval('seq_file_num'), #{file_name}, #{saved_file_name}, #{file_size} )
mapper.select: select num, userId, title, content, TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(createAt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') "createAt", readcount from gallery ORDER BY num DESC
